desc: For over a decade, we have been fortunate to have the opportunity to serve our community in Lake Charles, LA. We are thrilled to announce our famous boudin links will be available for pick up within the Houston, TX area. Nationwide shipping will be available soon so stay tuned!

layout.text: Peggy’s has been serving Lake Charles, Louisiana community for over two decades. We are pleased to bring you the best taste of boudin with only the freshest and finest ingredients. Whether you decide to grill, bake, or deep fry our boudin, we guarantee that every bite of this rice and meat-filled sausage will be delightful. No artificial coloring, flavoring, or preservatives!
